title: The Adventures of Cyclops and Phoenix 1-4 (1994)
description:
English | CBR | 4 Issues

The Adventures of Cyclops and Phoenix #1-4
Publisher:  Marvel
Publication Date:  May - August 1994

Writer:  Scott Lobdell
Penciler:  Gene Ha
Inker:  Al Vey (#1-4), Terry Austin (#2-3), Mark Pennington (#3), Joe Rubinstein (#3-4), Bill Anderson (#4), and Al Milgrom (#4)
COlorist:  Kevin Somers
Lettering:  Starkings/Comicraft

During their honeymoon, the minds of Jean and Scott are transported to human host bodies in the Askani future by Rachel, aka Mother Askani. She is now over a hundred years old and the Askani Clan is destroyed.  She explains that she brought the two into the future because she canÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t raise baby Nathan and overthrow Apocalypse herself.  Baby Nathan, however, had been captured by Palidan Ch'Vayre.  Jean and Scott manage to wrest the baby from him and escape in a floodwave. 2000 years from everything they know and remember, they have to raise the child and overthrow ApocalypseÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s rule.
